sentences.sentence: 470 to 890 MHz for UHF Channels 14 through 83.
In March 2010, the Navy submitted a UHF augmentation plan to Congress.
sentences.translation: 2010年3月，美国海军向国会提交一份超高频扩充计划。

sentences.sentence: Any aerial that can pick up UHF and VHF signals will receive digital television signals.
sentences.translation: 任何能捕捉到UHF和VHF信号的天线，都能接收数字电视信号。
